description: Numbers n such that Mertens' function M(n) (A002321) is zero.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5361
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Mertens Function
prog: (Perl) use ntheory ":all"; for (moebius(1,1e7)) { ++$i; say $i unless $M+=$_; } # _Dana Jacobsen_, May 22 2015
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
